name: thedailybeast
text:
EXCLUSIVE: In the last 4 years, Jared Kushner and a Russian sovereign wealth fund CEO Kirill Dmitriev have communicated in private about ways the U.S. and Russia could work together
https://t.co/GsBbyorU0Z

name: thedailybeast
text:
The conversations have touched on everything from creating a joint business council to working on a Middle East peace plan to delivering ventilators to NYC
https://t.co/BlmdizHd0t

name: thedailybeast
text:
Career national security officials have been sidelined in the process, raising alarms among some in the administration 
https://t.co/BlmdizpBBT

name: thedailybeast
text:
After the 2016 election, Putin himself tasked Dmitriev directly with trying to make inroads with Trump’s transition team, according to a recent report issued by the Senate intelligence committee
https://t.co/BlmdizHd0t

name: thedailybeast
text:
Dmitriev was the one who met with Blackwater founder Erik Prince in that infamous encounter in the Seychelles. And since then, he’s made a relationship with Kushner a priority. 
https://t.co/BlmdizHd0t

name: thedailybeast
text:
As the president’s son-in-law continued to use his personal relationships with foreign leaders to advance the White House and Trump’s goals, the administration’s Russia policy fell into disarray.

Read more: https://t.co/BlmdizHd0t

name: thedailybeast
text:
“Last year, we were here when that whole hill was on fire,” said Dino Rio, pointing to a smoldering western range a half-mile from the resort. “I’m not worried about hitting the fires.”

Guess that's one way to look at it...
https://t.co/xirWuUJdkx
